fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 advanced 46.35 points or 0.25% to settle at 18,534.10. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, dropped 4.07% to 11.13. Reliance Industries, ICICI Bank, HDFC Bank, were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The June 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 29 June 2023.
